title: 820-00164 bios apfs efi firmware
message:
Hi Team

I'd like to update a 820-00164 (mackbook air 7.1 early 2015)  Efi chip to apfs without installing High Sierra or Mojave ( no SSD ).

Is one of you could provide me a dump of a bios already passed to HS or Mojave for that mother board it would be nice.
Of course I'll clean the ME region and clean all the personal info with the Medusa to properly match my mother board.

Best Regards
